strapiPost.title: Housing Prices Continue To Rise In NWA
strapiPost.content:
The average cost of buying a home in NWA has seen a steep increase, though high mortgage rates have caused a 4.3% decline in the number of home sales compared to this time last year. 

  • Benton: The average home sale price in Benton County has reached $401,950, a 16.3% increase compared to this quarter in 2021. 
  • Washington: Washington County’s home sale price increased by 15.8%, averaging $361,971 compared to last year’s $312,467. 

Read the Talk Business & Politics article HERE.
